summary: Full testing of iteration 53 fixes - dead buttons, mobile responsive, and new features. All main features verified working.

minor.issue: Endpoint doesn't exist - stats computed client-side from claims (not a bug, just design)

fixed_by_tester.issue: Missing method: 'POST' in file upload fetch

context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 53 fixes verified: Documents upload opens file picker (not dead toast), ClaimDetails has Share Location button, MyCard Team tab loads, page transitions work, mobile responsive (390px) has no horizontal overflow. Minor fix applied: added method: 'POST' to Documents.jsx upload fetch.

documents_upload.notes: Upload Files button opens file picker dialog correctly

claim_details_share_location.notes: Button found with data-testid='share-location-btn', text shows 'SHARE LOCATION'

claim_details_notes_tab.notes: Notes tab with input and Add Note button working

claim_details_sms_tab.notes: SMS tab shows phone input, message input, and send button

mycard_team_tab.notes: Team tab loads with Squad Cards heading

dashboard_quick_actions.notes: Recon, Eve AI, Contracts buttons navigate correctly

mobile_responsive.notes: No horizontal overflow at 390px viewport on Dashboard, Documents, Claims, MyCard

page_transitions.notes: framer-motion AnimatedOutlet working - smooth navigation between routes
